oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lists
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Half of a large piece of paper, which was folded into four quarters and then diagonally several times. The writings in the top two quarters is 180 degrees to those in the bottom two quarters. The paper is torn, mutilated and carries water-marks. A Judaeo-Arabic list, some of the items in the list seem to be groceries: bread, eggsâ€¦ with Arabic numerals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Judeo-Arabic lists
